abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} to protect an innocent or one you have sworn a vow to or to overcome an obstacle with an uncanny feat of strength, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you spend a night in ceremony to hallow ground, call forth the abundance of the earth, or bless the fertility of a union, roll +heart and add +1. On a hit, envision the successful effect of this blessing and take +1 momentum. If you are within a community, you may immediately @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.b643d9ea53ff8d98]{Forge a Bond}. If you do, add +1.

When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.4dd8468e095810a4]{Secure an Advantage} by calling on the power of the storm, roll +heart and add +1. On a hit, envision how the storm manifests
